subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer matched the Champions Tour scoring records for a 54-hole event, with an eight-under 64 for an eight-stroke victory in the Administaff Small Business Classic in Spring, Tex. Langer finished at 25-under 191 to match the scoring marks for relation to par and low score. Mark O’Meara (68) was second, and Tom Kite (69) third at 16 under.
